help-file.title: "GOD, STRING"
help-file.content:
"String" is for changing the text-strings associated with objects and characters.
Syntax: string <type> <name> <field> [<string> | <keyword>]
<type> is either <obj> or <char>
<field> is one of the following (the names may be abbreviated):
Name (the call-name of an obj/char -e.g., "giant") Short (for inventory lists (obj's) and actions (char's)) Long (for when obj/character is seen in room) Title (for players) Description (for look-at. For obj's, must be followed by a keyword) Delete-description (only for obj's. Must be followed by a keyword)
Where a string is expected as the last argument, a newline will make you enter a string mode (like a bulletin board), and the game will prompt you for new lines to the string until you exceed the maximum length for the string or you end a line with a '@'. ===========================================================================& See also: "GOD, TITLE"
